answerText: Ryunosuke Akutagawa[10] Akutagawa names a semi-annual literary prize offered to writers from this country, whose authors include Kenzaburo Oe.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Wellesley + Hunter  | 10 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Lorenzo dies saving the bastard child he was accused of fathering with Ine from a burning building in this author's story "The Martyr." For 10 points each: [10] Name this author who wrote a story set outside a namesake gate in which a ronin steals the robe of an old lady and one in which a woodcutter, an old woman, a killer, and a man's wife offer conflicting testimony about a man's death.
